generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible lane markings, designed for vehicle traffic, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian path is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and some vegetation.
- building: A multi-story building with windows is prominently visible on the left side of the road.
- fence: A fence is visible along the right side of the road, separating it from an open area.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with a traffic sign and others supporting streetlights.
- traffic sign: A triangular warning sign and a circular "No Stopping" sign are visible on a pole.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the roadside and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and dirt areas are visible on the right side of the road, beyond the fence.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- car: Several cars are parked on the left side of the road, and one car is visible driving away in the distance.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the left side of the road, next to a car.
- rider: No rider is visible in the image.
